attributes.action: Replace the England Football team with A3 RuleOne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the overpaid, underpeforming football "stars" of this country are failing to live up to the standards expected of an Englihsman. We believe that by replacing the England Football team with a recent start-up five-a-side football team known as A3 RuleOne, based in New Malden, Surrey, the public will be better represented.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
